snippet.title: Farlight 84 | Official Announcement: "Hi, Buddy!" Expansion
snippet.description:
Farlight 84 is proud to unveil its most ambitious update yet—"Hi, Buddy!". 
Coming September 12.

0:00 Countdown
5:00 Intro 
6:54 Buddy Orb 
8:43 Buddies
16:00 Buddy Orb and Tactical Facilities
17:11 Map Updates
21:22 Weapon Updates
26:45 Tactical Core
29:15 Hero Updates
33:27 Other Improvements
34:22 New Skins
34:42 Farlight Universe
36:08 Outro


As always, we've got 3 special codes for you and your continuous support!
farlight84buddy
farlight84weapon
farlight84newuniverse


ABOUT FARLIGHT 84

The wait is almost over. Farlight 84, the groundbreaking battle royale experience that has captured the hearts and minds of gamers worldwide, is about to enter a new era. While we can’t spill all the details just yet, we want to give our passionate community a heads-up: something big is coming, and it’s going to change the game forever.

This isn’t just an update; it’s a new era, our next evolution. 


FOLLOW US
